product_details.name: Nothing Phone (2a) Plus (Grey, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage) | Up to 16GB RAM | Dimensity 7350 Pro 5G Processor | 50MP + 50MP | 50MP Front Camera | 6.7" AMOLED Display | 56 Minutes Charge of 100%
product_details.description: Nothing Phone (2a) Plus (Grey, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage) | Up to 16GB RAM | Dimensity 7350 Pro 5G Processor | 50MP + 50MP | 50MP Front Camera | 6.7" AMOLED Display | 56 Minutes Charge of 100%

banner_details:
This tech-themed promotional banner showcases a modern smartphone in a stylish, futuristic layout. The background utilizes a dark radial gradient with concentric dotted and solid circles, giving depth and focus to the central elements. Decorative tech-inspired lines and dot patterns enhance the design's high-tech aesthetic. At the center, a realistic image of a phone partially obscures a person standing behind, drawing attention to the product. The **heading** and **subheading** text layers are stacked near the top in sleek, futuristic fonts. The **price** tag is enclosed in a circular blue-purple gradient badge on the top-right. Lower on the banner, there's a concise **description** detailing the phone's features. Finally, a prominent **BUY NOW CTA button** in bright blue is positioned at the bottom center for conversion emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #2D2D2D → #131313  
- Accent Glow: #64D3FF → #5D5FEF  
- Text (Primary): #FFFFFF  
- Text (CTA): #000000  
- Button Fill: #64D3FF  
- Accent Details: #64D3FF, #5D5FEF
product_color: The product image showcases a minimalist yet futuristic aesthetic using a sleek, monochromatic color palette. Dominated by varying shades of metallic grey (#888C8D) and deep black (#0D0D0D), the design emphasizes modern engineering. Accents of white LED light strips (#FFFFFF) and subtle gradients enhance the phone’s premium and high-tech feel. The use of gunmetal silver (#A0A4A5) across the back cover circuitry gives a refined touch, while the dual camera lenses provide contrast with rich black glass (#1A1A1A). The background face highlights the phone's sleek design, creating visual focus. Together, these colors blend seamlessly while keeping each element visually distinct.
